languages.text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.
languages.original_text: Миссия Касбаллики заключает выгодные долгосрочные сделки с Вольными Торговцами, корсарами, пиратами и прочими искателями приключений, получая процент за сбыт и продажу нелегальных товаров. Она специализируется на хладном торге запретными артефактами ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

languages.text: Миссия Касбаллики заключает выгодные долгосрочные сделки с Вольными Торговцами, корсарами, пиратами и прочими искателями приключений, получая процент за сбыт и продажу нелегальных товаров. Она специализируется на хладном торге запретными артефактами ксеносов.

Die Kasballica-Mission schließt mit Freihändlern, Freibeutern, Piraten und anderen Schatzsuchern vorteilhafte, langfristige Geschäfte ab und handelt mit illegalen Waren, um einen Teil des Profits abzuzweigen. Ihre Spezialität ist der Kalthandel mit verbotenen Xeno-Artefakten.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

traits.locale_text: Die Kasballica-Mission handelt mit Freihändlern, Freibeutern, Piraten und anderen Schatzsuchern vorteilhafte, langfristige Geschäfte aus und handelt mit illegalen Waren, um einen Teil des Profits abzuzwacken. Ihre Spezialität ist der Kalte Handel mit verbotenen Xeno-Artefakten.

languages.text: La Mission de la Kasballica négocie des accords avantageux et pérennes avec des libres-marchands, des corsaires, des pirates et d'autres chercheurs de trésors, en leur cédant des marchandises illicites contre une partie de leurs bénéfices. Sa spécialité est le Commerce Froid de xéno-artéfacts interdits.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

traits.locale_text: La Mission de la Kasballica négocie des accords avantageux et pérennes avec des Libres-Marchands, des corsaires, des pirates et d'autres chercheurs de trésors, en leur cédant des marchandises illicites contre une part des bénéfices. Sa spécialité est le Commerce Froid d'artéfacts xénos interdits.

languages.text: 长期以来，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团一直与行商浪人、私掠者、海盗与其他寻宝者进行互助互利的贸易，通过交易非法货物进行牟利。卡斯巴利卡擅长冷市贸易，也就是倒卖帝国禁止的异形造物。
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

traits.locale_text: 长期以来，卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团一直与行商浪人、私掠者、海盗与其他寻宝者进行互助互利的贸易，通过交易非法货物进行牟利。卡斯巴利卡擅长冷市贸易，也就是倒卖帝国禁止的异形造物。

languages.text: カスバリカ聖務団は、自由開拓者、私掠船、海賊、その他の財宝を求める者たちと有益で長期的な取引を交渉し、利益の一部を得るために違法な商品を取引する。その専門は禁断の異種アーティファクトの冷たき取引である。
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

traits.locale_text: カスバリカ聖務団は、自由開拓者、私掠船、海賊、その他の財宝を求める者たちと有益で長期的な取引を交渉し、利益の一部を得るために違法な商品を取引する。その専門は禁断の異種アーティファクトの冷たき取引である。

languages.text: La Misión Kasballica negocia acuerdos provechosos a largo plazo con Comerciantes Independientes, corsarios, piratas y otros buscadores de tesoros, traficando con mercancías ilícitas a cambio de una parte de los beneficios. Su especialidad es el Comercio Frío de xenoartefactos prohibidos.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.

traits.locale_text: La Misión Kasballica negocia acuerdos provechosos a largo plazo con Comerciantes Independientes, corsarios, piratas y otros buscadores de tesoros, traficando con mercancías ilícitas a cambio de una parte de los beneficios. Su especialidad es el Comercio Frío de xenoartefactos prohibidos.

languages.text: Kasballica Misyonu; Hür Tacirler, izinli korsanlar, korsanlar ve diğer hazine avcılarıyla kazançlı ve uzun ömürlü anlaşmalar yapar. Yasa dışı malların ticaretinden komisyon alır. Özellikle de yasaklı zeno eserlerinin Soğuk Ticaret'inde uzmanlaşmıştır.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission negotiates beneficial, long-term deals with Rogue Traders, privateers, pirates, and other treasure seekers, dealing in illicit goods for a cut of the profits. Its specialty is the Cold Trade of forbidden xeno-artefacts.
